title: Nyteria Rising
description: Three civilisations are at war – a war that could lead to the end of Earth as we know it. The time has come to take sides. Valerie Saunders has been given a gift, a job and a hunter – now she has to decide what she wants, and who will guide her down the right path. There are the ones who can be trusted, the ones that must be obeyed, and the ones who can't be seen...She also has the perilous task of choosing her wedding dress!"
author: G.L. Twynham
